description:
Adobe Photoshop Lightroom CC is a powerful tool to manage and your digital images. In this course, I share with you one of my primary workflows that I use when working with portrait and model photography.

This workflow has helped me manage many 100s of photos from a single shoot and have client-ready photos available in a rapid amount of time.

Discover The Power Of Adobe Photoshop Lightroom To Create Beautiful Photos And Improve Your Digital Photography

  • Download 397 “Lightroom-Ready” photos for your own personal use
  • Follow along at your own pace
  • Excellent of the “Library" and "Develop" modules best suited for image organization and critique
  • Watch over my shoulder as I make "Develop" adjustments to the images in the catalog

Learn how to organize and sort your images (HINT: sort by “outfit #”) through the use of collections and image metadata such as:

  • Flags
  • Ratings
  • Color Labels
  • And more…

This course is designed for you if you want to:

  • Learn how to organize and sort your images (HINT: sort by “outfit #”) for model photography
  • Improve and adjust your workflow to take advantage of Lightroom's full capabilities of SPEED and EFFICIENCY
  • Develop your digital photography skills
  • Discover new ways to retouch and make colour adjustments with Lightroom

Section #1 – Introduction and downloadable resources including my personal story and experience with Adobe Photoshop Lightroom and model photography.

Section #2 – A short introduction to Lightroom and understanding Lightroom preview (.lrprev) files.

Section #3 – Case Study of Aimee and my Model Photography Workflow - Part 1

Section #4 – Case Study of Aimee and my Model Photography Workflow - Part 2

Section #5 – A few bonus lectures for your further learning

Take Action & Enroll

Click "Take This Course" now and make the commitment to jumpstart your learning. See you on the inside and check out the preview videos to see what you'll be getting!

Wishing you much success in your journeys,

Thushyanthan
title: Model Photography Workflow In Adobe Lightroom CC
